JobTitle: Strategic Program Manager, News and IP
JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking an experienced Strategic Program Manager to help coordinate company-wide projects related to News and IP related issues. In addition to working directly with various global News Partnerships colleagues, this individual will be collaborating with a global cross-functional team consisting of Policy, Legal, Product, and Deal teams, among others. This hire will focus on tracking, monitoring, and identifying global news and IP developments, and help develop strategic responses accordingly.This role requires the pairing of both tactical organization skills with a high level of strategic thinking. In addition, we are looking for someone with experience to leading and coordinating broad regional cross-functional teams. It’s important that this individual can guide complex conversations, navigate ambiguity, and synthesize problems to drive sustainable, long term solutions. Candidates should be dedicated, detail-oriented, and resourceful.
